title: The Awakening
description: One of the most powerful of her generation.They tell her he is her equal and she must learn to protect herself from their enemies.When Allie Carmichael finds herself caught up in a dangerous world of immortality she never knew existed, nothing is as it seems. As a latent Immortal power awakens deep inside her and her first gifts begin to emerge, Allie must learn to adapt to her power before it overwhelms her. But she’s years behind her peers, with precious little time to catch up.They say it is time to put her mortal life behind her, but she still feels like the normal girl she always thought she was. The Awakening is the first book in a series of dark, paranormal urban fantasy tales. If you like high-stakes action, strong female leads, and something more than the usual suspects (vampires, werewolves and shifters), then you’ll love the Immortals of Melissa A. Craven’s imaginative world.
author: Melissa A. Craven
